markdownRemark.html:
We can use 2 ways to check data types:

ES6 native:

const check = typeof "hello" === "string";
console.log(check);
//result: true

Lodash:

import _ from "lodash";

const check = _.isString("hello");
console.log(check);
//result: true
markdownRemark.excerpt: We can use 2 ways to check data types: ES6 native: Lodash:
